div.div: Our K-8th grade campus faculty and staff members all have college degrees and are Highly Qualified and Certified. We are all excited to meet our new students and family members. We expect our students to learn at the highest level. We have the very best, caring, qualified teachers, faculty and staff that you will find anywhere.

div.h3: Texas Serenity Academy Gano K-5th Campus

div.div: Our students will receive the very best education, enjoy new learning experiences and have fun enrichment activities along the way such as plays, talent shows, spelling bee competitions, science fairs, Cinco De Mayo celebrations, Black History Month celebrations and more.

We are a member of the Texas Charter School Athletic Association (TCSAA) and we compete with public school districts all over Houston and the State of Texas. Our Coaches are also classroom Teachers and volunteer their time to coach after the regular school day has ended.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid thim-bg-overlay vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving

div.p: THE HOUSTON CHRONICLE MOST RECENT REPORT CARD RATED OUR K-8TH GRADE CAMPUS AN “A” RATED SCHOOL DISTRICT.

p.span: TSA IS ONLY 1 OF 3 PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOLS TO RECEIVE AN “A” RATING.
OUR K-8TH GRADE CAMPUS IS RATED IN THE TOP 10% OF ALL PUBLIC SCHOOLS.
FOR BEST CHOICE PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOLS IN THE CITY OF HOUSTON WE ARE RANKED 15TH.

a.span:
Click Here To Enroll or
Re-Enroll a Student Online

h1.strong: 2020-2021 For Both Texas Serenity Academy Campus Locations:

div.h4: Texas Serenity Academy Gano K-5th Campus
Please call 281-820-9540 or 281-931-8887 to schedule an appointment.
Enrolling a student into our school is a simple process.
Bring the following to the main Registrar’s Office located at 8787 North Houston Rosslyn Road, Texas 77088:

li.h4: Proof of Residence (Such as a light bill, water bill, lease agreement, etc.)
Driver’s License of Parent and/or Legal Guardian
If you do not have a current driver’s license a State of Texas Identification Card is acceptable

","select_all_link":"Select all pages","clear_selection":"Clear Selection.","pagination":{"all":"All","next":"Next","previous":"Previous"},"select":{"rows":{"0":"","_":": Selected %d rows","1":": Selected 1 row"}},"datepicker":{"dayNames":["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"],"dayNamesShort":["Sun","Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat"],"dayNamesMin":["S","M","T","W","T","F","S"],"monthNames":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"monthNamesShort":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"monthNamesMin":["Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","Jun","Jul","Aug","Sep","Oct","Nov","Dec"],"nextText":"Next","prevText":"Prev","currentText":"Today","closeText":"Done","today":"Today","clear":"Clear"}};var tribe_system_info = {"sysinfo_optin_nonce":"4cceb4e65e","clipboard_btn_text":"Copy to clipboard","clipboard_copied_text":"System info copied","clipboard_fail_text":"Press \"Cmd + C\" to copy"};/* */
